item.title: 日本烟草公司高管表示可能考虑在美国生产 Ploom 设备
item.description: 日本烟草国际公司的一位高管周二告诉路透社，该公司愿意在美国生产其 Ploom 加热烟草设备，因为特朗普政府的关税政策促使一些公司重新考虑其供应链。【原文：Japan Tobacco International is open to producing its Ploom heated tobacco device in the United States, an executive told Reuters on Tuesday, as the Trump administration's tariff policies prompt some companies to rethink their supply chains.】

item.title: 联合信贷银行为争取欧盟点头同意 Banco BPM 交易作出让步
item.description: 根据欧盟委员会网站上的一份最新文件，意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit）已提出让步，试图获得欧盟对其收购 Banco BPM 的反垄断批准。【原文：Italian bank UniCredit has offered concessions in an attempt to secure EU antitrust approval for its acquisition of Banco BPM , according to an updated filing on the European Commission website.】

item.title: 特朗普媒体将为比特币国库筹集 25 亿美元资金
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的社交媒体公司特朗普媒体和技术集团（Trump Media and Technology Group）周二表示，该公司已与机构投资者达成协议，将筹集约 25 亿美元用于创建比特币国库。【原文：Trump Media and Technology Group has entered into agreements with institutional investors to raise about $2.5 billion for the creation of a bitcoin treasury, U.S. President Donald Trump's social media firm said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 上海期货交易所扩大对外国人开放，努力实现人民币国际化
item.description: 上海期货交易所（ShFE）周二发布了进一步向海外投资者和经纪商开放国内期货的建议草案，作为帮助人民币国际化努力的一部分。【原文：The Shanghai Futures Exchange (ShFE) released draft proposals on Tuesday to further open up domestic futures to overseas investors and brokers as part of an effort to help internationalise the renminbi.】

item.title: 金属亿万富翁波塔宁收购 "俄罗斯谷歌 "少数股份
item.description: 根据相关公司的声明，俄罗斯亿万富翁弗拉基米尔-波塔宁（Vladimir Potanin）通过他拥有的公司收购了互联网巨头 Yandex 9.95% 的股份，Yandex 经常被称为 "俄罗斯的谷歌"。【原文：Russian billionaire Vladimir Potanin has acquired a 9.95% stake in internet giant Yandex , often dubbed "Russia's Google", through companies he owns, according to statements from companies involved.】

item.title: 美国 4 月份核心资本货物订单下滑
item.description: 4 月份，美国主要制成品资本货物的新订单减少，表明企业在设备方面的支出在第二季度初有所减弱。【原文：New orders for key U.S.-manufactured capital goods fell in April, suggesting business spending on equipment weakened at the start of the second quarter.】

item.title: 瑞士从美国的月度黄金进口量创下至少 2012 年以来的新高
item.description: 瑞士海关周二的数据显示，在贵金属被排除在美国进口关税之外后，瑞士4月份从美国进口的黄金跃升至至少2012年以来的最高月度水平。【原文：Gold imports to Switzerland from the United States jumped to the highest monthly level since at least 2012 in April after the exclusion of precious metals from U.S. import tariffs, Swiss customs data showed on Tuesday.】

item.title: 东盟领导人同意与美国达成的关税协议不应损害成员国利益
item.description: 马来西亚总理安瓦尔-易卜拉欣（Anwar Ibrahim）表示，东南亚领导人周二达成了一项谅解，即他们可能与美国就贸易关税达成的任何双边协议都不会损害彼此的经济。【原文：Southeast Asian leaders reached an understanding on Tuesday that any bilateral agreements they might strike with the United States on trade tariffs would not harm each others' economies, Malaysia's premier Anwar Ibrahim said.】

item.title: 美国国家公共电台就削减拨款的命令起诉特朗普
item.description: 美国公共广播公司（NPR）周二表示，它已起诉特朗普政府，对总统削减NPR和同为广播公司的美国公共广播公司（PBS）联邦经费的行政命令提出质疑。【原文：Public broadcaster NPR said on Tuesday it had sued the Trump administration, challenging the president's executive order to cut federal funding for NPR and fellow broadcaster PBS.】

item.title: 受汇率影响，AutoZone 第三季度利润下降 6.6
item.description: AutoZone Inc 周二公布的季度利润下降了 6.6%，原因是需求疲软和汇率波动影响了这家汽车零部件零售商的利润率。【原文：AutoZone Inc on Tuesday reported a 6.6% drop in quarterly profit, as softening demand and currency fluctuations weighed on the auto parts retailer's margins.】

item.title: 贸易战冲击加拿大经济，多伦多证券交易所（TSX）涨势将放缓
item.description: 路透社的一项民意调查显示，加拿大的主要股票指数将在2025年剩余时间内基本巩固近期的涨势，并可能面临再次回调的风险，因为美国关税导致国内经济出现放缓迹象。【原文：Canada's main stock index is set to largely consolidate its recent gains through the rest of 2025 and could be at risk of another correction as the domestic economy shows signs of a slowdown due to U.S. tariffs, a Reuters poll found.】

item.title: 加密公司 Circle Internet 和部分股东计划在美国 IPO 上募集 6.24 亿美元资金
item.description: 稳定币发行商Circle Internet和一些现有股东周二表示，他们的目标是在美国首次公开募股中筹集多达6.24亿美元的资金。【原文：Circle Internet and some existing stockholders are aiming to raise as much as $624 million in an initial public offering in the United States, the stablecoin issuer said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 早间竞价贸易混乱与多头收益缓解
item.description: 当今美国和全球市场的重要事件【原文：What matters in U.S. and global markets today】

item.title: 华尔街日报》报道：Salesforce 接近以 80 亿美元收购 Informatica
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周二援引知情人士的话报道，Salesforce 即将以大约 80 亿美元的价格收购数据管理软件公司 Informatica。【原文：Salesforce is nearing a roughly $8 billion deal for data-management software firm Informatica , the Wall Street Journal reported on Tuesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 共同社称美国政府可能在新日铁交易中持有美国钢铁公司部分股份
item.description: 据共同社周二报道，美国政府可能会持有美国钢铁公司的部分股份，作为日本新日铁公司收购美国钢铁公司交易的一部分。【原文：The U.S. government may hold some of U.S. Steel's shares as part of a deal to allow Japan's Nippon Steel to acquire the American steelmaker, Kyodo reported on Tuesday.】

item.title: Temu 公司所有者 PDD 控股公司季度收入未达预期
item.description: 中国电子商务公司点点客控股周二公布的第一季度营收不及华尔街预期，原因是其国内平台拼多多因消费者情绪疲软而受挫，而其国际业务特姆优受到全球贸易政策不确定性的打击。【原文：Chinese e-commerce company PDD Holdings missed Wall Street estimates for first-quarter revenue on Tuesday, as its domestic platform Pinduoduo suffered from weak consumer sentiment while its international business Temu was hit by uncertain global trade policies.】

item.title: 乌克兰整顿矿产部门，期待美国协议带来数十亿美元投资
item.description: 乌克兰生态部部长表示，乌克兰正在全面整顿其饱受三年战争摧残的矿产部门，希望通过与美国的矿产交易释放潜力并吸引数十亿美元的投资。【原文：Ukraine is overhauling its minerals sector, which has been pounded by three years of war, in the hope of unlocking potential and attracting billions of dollars of investment from a minerals deal with the U.S., its ecology minister said.】

item.title: 腾讯将成为 K-Pop 经纪公司 SM Entertainment 的第二大股东
item.description: 据韩国周二提交的一份文件显示，中国腾讯有望成为主要 K-Pop 经纪公司 SM Entertainment 的第二大股东。【原文：China's Tencent is expected to become the second-largest shareholder of major K-Pop agency SM Entertainment , according to a South Korean filing on Tuesday.】

item.title: 外交部称新加坡航空公司气流调查尚未完成
item.description: 新加坡当局周二表示，对新加坡航空公司去年一架遭遇乱流、造成数十人受伤、一人死亡的航班的调查仍在等待对飞机天气雷达系统的分析结果。【原文：Singapore authorities said on Tuesday that an investigation into a Singapore Airlines flight last year that hit turbulence, injuring dozens of people and killing one, was still awaiting analysis of the plane's weather radar systems.】

item.title: 意大利商界游说团敦促欧盟加快与美国以外国家的贸易往来
item.description: 意大利主要商业游说团体 Confindustria 周二呼吁欧盟在与美国总统唐纳德-特朗普就关税问题进行谈判的同时，加快与其他国家达成贸易协议。【原文：Italy's main business lobby Confindustria on Tuesday called on the European Union to speed up trade agreements with other countries while it negotiates on tariffs with US President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 英伟达财报显示受美国对华出口限制影响
item.description: 英伟达（Nvidia）周三发布业绩报告时，投资者将寻求明确答案，以了解美国对中国的芯片限制措施将给该公司带来多大损失，尽管其他法规的回落有望打开新的市场。【原文：Nvidia investors will look for definitive answers on how much U.S. chip curbs on China will cost the company when it reports results on Wednesday, even as a pullback in other regulations is expected to open up new markets.】

item.title: 得克萨斯州准备对苹果和谷歌应用商店实施年龄验证
item.description: 一项要求苹果公司和 Alphabet 旗下谷歌公司核实其应用程序商店用户年龄的法案本周可能在得克萨斯州成为法律，从而使这个美国人口第二多的州成为是否以及如何监管儿童和青少年使用智能手机的争论焦点。【原文：A bill that requires Apple and Alphabet's Google to verify the age of users of their app stores could become law this week in Texas, putting the second-most-populous state in the U.S. at the center of a debate over whether and how to regulate the use of smartphones by children and teenagers.】

item.title: 特朗普关税闪电战引发美联储研究人员 "灭火式 "回应
item.description: 自 1 月份以来，美国联邦储备委员会（美联储）的工作人员一直在努力解读特朗普政府的贸易政策将对经济产生怎样的影响，他们公布了潜在收入损失的统计数字、通胀率估计值高出 2 个百分点之多，以及显示各州赢家和输家的细分数据。【原文：U.S. Federal Reserve staffers have scrambled since January to decipher what Trump administration trade policies will mean for the economy, with published tallies of potential income losses, inflation estimates running as much as 2 percentage points higher, and breakdowns showing state-by-state winners and losers.】

item.title: 受特朗普贸易战影响的零售商接受更多 "私有化 "提议
item.description: 因美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的贸易战而股价大跌的零售商，其董事会和所有者越来越热衷于出售股份，以摆脱近几个月来导致公司估值摇摆不定的市场混乱局面。【原文：Boards and the owners of retailers whose shares have been pummeled by U.S. President Donald Trump's trade war are increasingly warming to offers to sell – and to escape the market chaos that has caused company valuations to seesaw in recent months.】

item.title: 日本拍卖 40 年期债务，关注主权财政压力迹象
item.description: 市场将密切关注本周三日本最长期限债券的拍卖，以了解债务投资者是否会继续忍受主要政府发行人日益恶化的财务状况。【原文：The markets will be closely watching an auction of Japan's longest tenor bonds on Wednesday to see if debt investors will continue to put up with the worsening finances of major government issuers.】

item.title: Pornhub、Stripchat、XNXX、XVideos 成为欧盟调查的目标
item.description: 欧盟监管机构周二表示，成人内容平台 Pornhub、Stripchat、XNXX 和 XVideos 将因涉嫌违反欧盟网络内容法而接受调查。【原文：Adult content platforms Pornhub, Stripchat, XNXX and XVideos will be investigated for suspected breaches of EU online content law, EU regulators said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 据《商报》报道，德国财团正在洽谈建设人工智能数据中心事宜
item.description: 据德国《商报》周二报道，德国思爱普公司（SAP）、德国电信公司（Deutsche Telekom）、网络托管公司Ionos和非上市零售商施瓦茨公司（Schwarz）正在争夺欧盟的支持，以建立一个大型人工智能数据处理中心。【原文：Germany's SAP , Deutsche Telekom , web hosting firm Ionos and unlisted retailer Schwarz are vying for European Union support to build a large data processing centre for artificial intelligence, the Handelsblatt newspaper reported on Tuesday.】

item.title: 小米推出全新电动 SUV，营收增长 47
item.description: 周二，中国小米公司公布第一季度营收大幅增长 47.4%，该公司加倍努力生产电动汽车。【原文：China's Xiaomi reported a 47.4% jump in first-quarter revenue on Tuesday as the company doubled down on making electric vehicles.】

item.title: 贸易缓和，长周末后美股期货反弹
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普收回了对欧盟征收高额关税的威胁，随着交易员们在阵亡将士纪念日假期结束后返回美国，美国与欧洲集团之间的紧张关系有所缓和，美国股指期货周二跳涨。【原文：U.S. stock index futures jumped on Tuesday after President Donald Trump rolled back his threat of steep tariffs against the EU and tensions between the United States and the European bloc cooled as traders returned after the Memorial Day break.】

item.title: 台积电将在德国慕尼黑设立欧洲芯片设计中心
item.description: 全球最大的合约芯片制造商台湾积体电路制造股份有限公司（Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co.【原文：Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co , the world's largest contract chipmaker, will open a chip design centre in Munich, Germany, a company executive said on Tuesday.】
